content.value:
This unit encompasses the human right unit which is governed by the legal clinic policy and it is aimed at focusing on human right activities of the legal
clinic and provides practical representation for the clients and theoretical aspects to the students of the faculty of law.

This unit also conducts free legal services to the refugees and IDPs in respect to areas mandated to provide legal coverage by legal clinic, particularly, the human right refugees, and IDP issues that fall under the jurisdiction of this unit.
